ì¬ë¯¸ìˆëŠ” ruby í´ë˜ìŠ¤

Class

class Greeter
  def initialize(name = "World")
    @name = name
  end
  def say_hi
    puts "Hi #{@name}!"
  end
  def say_bye
    puts "Bye #{@name}, come back soon."
  end
end

g = Greeter.new("junhyeok".capitalize)
g.name = "Andy"
